name: dusting
content:
dusting noun [U]
(CLEANING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of removing dust from furniture, books, etc.: First she did the dusting.

dusting noun [U]
(THIN LAYER)
a thin layer of powder, snow, etc.: There was a dusting of snow on the lawn.
